dict.acceptation: （构成疑问句和否定句）；（代替动词）；（用于加强语气）；
[口语]事件；[主英国口语]诈骗；[主英国、新西兰口语]宴会；[口语]必须做到的事情；

sent.orig: Look, you've typed "do" as "so", and made nonsense of the whole sentence.
sent.trans: 瞧，你把do打成了so，这样一来句子就不通了。

sent.orig: Do in Rome as Rome does.; Do as the Romans do.
Do not do to others what you would not have them do to you.
If other people can do it, so can we.; What other people can do we can do, too.
sent.trans: 人家能做到的，我们也能做到。

sent.orig: Why do you egg him on to do what you won't do yourself?
sent.trans: 你自己不干，为什么撺弄他呢？
